description.part1: Since early on, I've always been a big fan of games, which led me to my first foray into the world of technology, exploring game development using Java, and later, the Unity development platform.
description.part2: However, my curiosity led me to explore other avenues, and that's how I ventured into Web Development. This journey captivated me with its complex structures and innovative technologies, inspiring me to delve even deeper into this field.
description.part3: Since the beginning of 2022, I've been immersed in my studies of Web Development, both on the front-end (Frontend) and behind the scenes (Backend).

profile.introduction: Hello, I'm Nicholas, a technology enthusiast who has been studying programming since 2021. My journey began with game development, which quickly expanded to web development and even led me to explore the fascinating world of artificial intelligence. Today, my focus is on becoming a Software Developer, so I continue studying technologies such as Kubernetes, Docker, Golang, Python, Typescript, Next.js, SQL, MongoDB and others.
